Articles.Content: So, I'm bored, I have no school for the next one and a half month, and it's evening. Have some art. All of it is done in 4k. And yes, I plan on drawing more.

Here's my twitter too if you want to do me a favor and follow me. I might even post about my upcoming videos or pictures.

https://twitter.com/EvilotionCR2

I too am on study leave (or whatever people call it, that 2 month break off school). I see you're managing your time better than me I should get back to drawing.. haven't done a KSP related image for a while.
